1684200.name: Super Sami Roll Soundtrack
1684200.description:
The Super Sami Roll Official Soundtrack is available for purchase on Steam!

Each of the tracks were meticulously composed by the musical genius, Damian Moloney (Evader Music).

Containing 22 of the catchiest chiptunes for one hour of Super Sami Roll goodness, full of breezy beats and tense tempos that help you relive some of Super Sami Roll’s best moments.
